de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.math

Class Vec4

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.math.Vec4
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Vec4
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Holds a 4-tuple vector.
    Version:
    $Revision: 2983 $ $Id: Vector4f.java 2983 2008-04-07 18:36:09Z matzon $
    Author:
    cix_foo , void256 - removed the interfaces this class implements and remove the base class to make that a simple and plain self-contained class
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
